00067                 {

00087                 static function purge_querystring()
00088                 {
00089                         $pairs = explode('&', $_SERVER['QUERY_STRING']);
00090                         $newpairs = array();
00091                         foreach ($pairs as $pair)
00092                         {
00093                                 if (!empty($pair))
00094                                 {
00095                                         @list($key, $value) = explode('=', $pair);
00096                                         if (in_array($key, array('action', 'controller', 'id')))
00097                                         {
00098                                                 continue;
00099                                         }
00100                                         $newpairs[] = $pair;
00101                                 }
00102                         }
00103                         return implode('&', $newpairs);
00104                 }
00105         }
